hero.badge: Official AI Platform of CBNU Startup Support Center
hero.subtitle: CASA is an AI startup accelerator that automatically creates business plans, pitch decks, and landing pages from your idea validation.

problem.title: Struggling with these startup challenges?
problem.card1Title: I have an idea, but how do I write a business plan?
problem.card1Desc: You're overflowing with ideas, but organizing and documenting them systematically feels overwhelming.
problem.card2Title: I'm not sure if my idea is really viable
problem.card2Desc: You can't be sure from just the reactions around you, and professional validation is expensive and time-consuming.
problem.card3Desc: Business plan, IR materials, website... Preparing everything alone takes months.
problem.highlightLine1: Average time for business plan writing: 3-4 weeks
problem.highlightConclusion: 2 months of preparation — with CASA, just one day.

solution.title: AI accompanies every step of your startup journey
solution.subtitle: From a single idea input, everything from validation to deployment is automated
solution.step3Desc: Business plan, pitch deck, landing page
solution.step4Desc: Publish to the world with one click
solution.step4Tags: Landing Deploy · Share Links · Mentor Approval

features.title: Core Features of CASA
features.subtitle: AI delivers optimal results at every stage
features.f1Title: One-line idea becomes a complete business model
features.f1Desc: Enter a vague idea, and AI complements gaps through questions, automatically generating structured idea cards with problem definition, solution, target customers, and differentiation.
features.f1Point2: AI supplements missed perspectives with questions
features.f1Point3: Edit and regenerate as many times as you want
features.f2Desc: AI from investor, market analyst, and tech expert perspectives independently evaluates your idea. From profitability, market size, to technical feasibility — comprehensive scores and improvement suggestions are provided.
features.f2Point1: Investor AI: Revenue model, scalability, risk analysis
features.f2Point2: Market Analyst AI: Market size, competitors, entry strategy
features.f2Point3: Tech Expert AI: Technical feasibility, development complexity, trends
features.f3Title: Complete startup documents with one click
features.f3Desc: Based on validated ideas, AI automatically generates business plans, pitch summaries (IR materials), and promotional landing pages. Formatted for government support programs and ready to submit.
features.f3Point1: Business Plan: Government format compliant, PDF download
features.f3Point2: Pitch Summary: 1-page elevator pitch for investors
features.f4Title: Publish your results to the world instantly
features.f4Desc: Deploy completed landing pages to the web with one click, and share documents via links with investors and mentors. Get mentor feedback to refine your results further.
features.f4Point1: One-click landing page deployment (real URL generated)

testimonial.title: Stories from CASA users
testimonial.t1Quote: I was lost on how to write a business plan. After entering my idea into CASA, I was amazed to see a completed document in 30 minutes. The AI even pointed out market risks I hadn't considered, helping me build a more solid plan.
testimonial.t2Quote: I got IR materials at a level ready for investor meetings without external consulting. The 3-perspective AI evaluation was particularly impressive. I could prepare for questions that actual investors would ask.
testimonial.t3Quote: Giving feedback on students' ideas used to take so much time. With CASA, I can review structured ideas and evaluation results first, then focus on key advice. Mentoring efficiency has greatly improved.

process.title: Start in 4 steps
process.subtitle: From signup to deployment — completely free
process.step1Desc: Quick signup with email or social login
process.step2Desc: One line or one page — write your idea freely
process.step3Desc: AI validates, evaluates, and creates documents. Review and edit at each stage.
process.step4Desc: Download your business plan, pitch deck, landing page or deploy instantly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, all features are currently free for CBNU-affiliated users. AI API costs are covered by the platform.
faq.q2: Can any type of idea work?
faq.a2: Yes, you can enter startup ideas from any field — IT services, manufacturing, services, etc. The AI analyzes according to the relevant industry.
faq.q3: What's the quality of AI-generated documents?
faq.a3: Business plans comply with government support program formats and are submission-ready. Users can also review and edit at each stage to achieve desired quality.
faq.q4: Does AI make all decisions automatically?
faq.a4: No. CASA uses a 'Human-in-the-Loop' approach — AI creates drafts, and all important decisions are reviewed and approved by users. Through 4 approval gates, users control the entire process.
faq.a5: Yes, all documents support section-by-section revision requests and full regeneration. You can iterate until you get the desired results.
faq.q6: How do I get mentor feedback?
faq.a6: Click the 'Request Mentor Feedback' button at each stage to notify your assigned mentor. Mentors write feedback on their dashboard, and you can review and apply it.
faq.q7: Is the landing page actually published online?
faq.a7: Yes, after deployment approval, a real URL is generated and accessible to anyone. It's reliably hosted through Vercel infrastructure.
faq.a8: All data is encrypted and stored with Row Level Security — only you and authorized mentors can access it. Your ideas are never exposed externally or used as training data.
faq.q9: Can I use it in English?
faq.a9: Yes, Korean and English are supported. You can switch in language settings, and AI-generated documents are also written in your selected language.
faq.a10: Currently in MVP stage, the service is for CBNU-affiliated users. We plan to expand to other universities and general users in the future.
